org.fcrepo.auth.xacml

Class TripleAttributeFinderModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.security.xacml.sunxacml.finder.AttributeFinderModule
      • org.fcrepo.auth.xacml.TripleAttributeFinderModule

  • @Component(value="tripleAttributeFinderModule")
public class TripleAttributeFinderModule
extends org.jboss.security.xacml.sunxacml.finder.AttributeFinderModule
    Finds resource attributes based on triples in the Fedora graph. Retrieves values where the attribute URI matches the triple predicate and the triple object can be supplied as the requested data type.
    Author:
    Gregory Jansen, Andrew Woods, Scott Prater
